This looks good to me.  Comments are minor.

---

Reviewed 27 of 29 files at r1, 2 of 2 files at r2.
Review status: all files reviewed, 5 unresolved discussions (waiting on @jiangtaoli2016 and @yihuazhang)

---

*[src/core/lib/security/security_connector/local_security_connector.cc, line 37 at r2](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15909#-LGWEPrV1zG0sYIxTC0f:-LGWEPrV1zG0sYIxTC0g:byniczl) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/0bcc55f6b7d6dd33abeaa041810dbd75a07f435a/src/core/lib/security/security_connector/local_security_connector.cc#L37)):*
> ```cpp
> #include "src/core/tsi/local_transport_security.h"
> 
> #define GRPC_UDS_URL_SCHEME "unix"
> ```

Please include a ':' at the end of this string, so that we don't accidentally match URIs whose schemes start with "unix" but contain additional characters (e.g., "unixa").

---

*[src/core/tsi/local_transport_security.cc, line 195 at r2](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15909#-LGWFeP368gJrYFp31Sx:-LGWFeP368gJrYFp31Sy:bxzct6o) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/0bcc55f6b7d6dd33abeaa041810dbd75a07f435a/src/core/tsi/local_transport_security.cc#L195)):*
> ```cpp
>     handshaker_destroy,
>     handshaker_next,
>     nullptr, /* shutdown */
> ```

Shouldn't we have a shutdown method, even if it's a no-op?

---
